title: D A Rajapaksa- 43rd death anniversary commemoration ceremony at Tangalla
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) The 43rd death anniversary commemoration of former Deputy Speaker and Minister late D.A. Rajapaksa was held at Tangalla this morning on 07th November. D.A. Rajapaksa is the father of President Mahinda Rajapaksa, Speaker Chamal Rajapaksa, Minister Basil Rajapaksa and Defence Secretary Gotabhaya Rajapaksa. Late D.A….
